children.name: Abinadom
children.sourceText: Behold, I, Abinadom, am the son of Chemish.

children.name: according
children.sourceText: And behold, the record of this people is engraven upon plates which is had by the kings, according to the generations; and I know of no revelation save that which has been written, neither prophecy; wherefore, that which is sufficient is written.

children.name: am
children.sourceText: Behold, I, Abinadom, am the son of Chemish.

children.name: been
children.sourceText: And behold, the record of this people is engraven upon plates which is had by the kings, according to the generations; and I know of no revelation save that which has been written, neither prophecy; wherefore, that which is sufficient is written.

children.name: brethren
children.sourceText: Behold, it came to pass that I saw much war and contention between my people, the Nephites, and the Lamanites; and I, with my own sword, have taken the lives of many of the Lamanites in the defence of my brethren.

children.name: Chemish
children.sourceText: Behold, I, Abinadom, am the son of Chemish.
